DOC.brief_summary: This open-label , fixed-sequence , multiple dose crossover study 14 healthy male and/or female subject , estimate effect steady state lersivirine steady state pharmacokinetics abacavir/lamivudine .
DOC.brief_title: Estimate The Effect Of Lersivirine On The Pharmacokinetics Of Abacavir/Lamivudine In Healthy Subjects
DOC.criteria: Healthy male and/or female subject . Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 17.5 30.5 kg/m2 . Total body weight > 50 kg ( 110 lb ) . History regular alcohol consumption exceed 7 drinks/week female 14 drinks/week male ( 1 drink = 5 ounce ( 150 mL ) wine 12 ounce ( 360 mL ) beer 1.5 ounce ( 45 mL ) hard liquor ) within 6 month screen . Use tobacco nicotinecontaining product excess equivalent 5 cigarette per day . Treatment investigational drug within 30 day ( determined local requirement , whichever long ) 5 halflives precede first dose study medication . History hypersensitivity abacavir , lamivudine and/or lersivirine .
